subcategory.name: Feeds
subcategory.description: Activity feed and timeline examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS feed components to display things like updates, notifications, and activity logs in a chronological format. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
